extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed FortiOS or FortiProxy version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is upgrading to the latest version possible?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade affected FortiOS & FortiProxy products to the latest version to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable HTTP/2 Support
extracted_playbook.description: Disable HTTP/2 support on SSL inspection profiles used by proxy policies or firewall policies with proxy mode as a workaround.
